channel.title: Notice board | Unimi

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 13 + 14 May 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 13 + 14 May 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Web service disruptions (13 March)
item.description: Thursday, 13 March from 19.00 to 22.00, you may experience slow service and/or service disruptions on spoc.unimi.it, servicemanagement.unimi.it, informastudenti.unimi.it and reclamistudenti.unimi.it.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Student reception on Friday, March 14th, 2025
item.description: On Friday, March 14th 2025, the student reception for the Single cycle Master‚Äôs Degree in Law and the Bachelor's degree in Sciences of Legal Services will only be available remotely, from 9:30 to 12:00, either via MS Teams (please click on the link) or by phone on 02-50312473.%0A

item.title: Call for student workers n.3/2025 - ranking list now available
item.description: Please find attached the ranking list for the call for student workers n.3/2025 for tutoring activities at the laboratory of Physiology, via Colombo 71 (100 hours).%0A%0AüìÑ Ranking list

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in April-May at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
